abstract: The mode of operation that is of interest in this discussion is a solar array battery load-sharing mode. The battery is loaded for a fraction of a second and then charged, so the cycle is a 100 millisecond load, followed by a 500 millisecond charge. The purpose of the experiment was to evaluate the charge efficiency and the state of charge. Charge/discharge ratio graphs are presented.
title: Synchronous meteorological and geostationary operational environmental satellites operational experience

publications.publicationName: NASA.  Goddard Space Flight Center  The 1977 Goddard Space Flight Center Battery Workshop

related.title: The 1977 Goddard Space Flight Center Battery Workshop
